root.name: Rock Band: Country Track Pack
root.description: OverviewThe Rock Band Country Track Pack was announced on May 12, 2009. It was released in North America on July 21, 2009 for the Xbox 360, Playstation 3, Wii, and Playstation 2 consoles, with a retail price of $29.99. A European release has not been announced. The game is fully compatible with peripherals that work with Rock Band.Like previous Rock Band Track Packs, the Country edition is a standalone game whose songs can be imported into Rock Band and Rock Band 2 via an included download code. Unlike previous Rock Band Track Packs, this game included several exclusive songs that were not available as DLC for the Rock Band platform. The exclusive tracks will eventually became DLC within six months of the track pack's release.SetlistThe Country Track Pack contains 21 songs, 12 of which had not appeared previously in the Rock Band Store. They include:*Trace Adkins "Swing"*Jason Aldean "She's Country"Dierks Bentley "Free Easy (Down the Road I Go)"Brooks Dunn "Hillbilly Deluxe"*Kenny Chesney "She Thinks My Tractor's Sexy"*Cross Canadian Ragweed "Cry Lonely"Dixie Chicks "Sin Wagon"Drive-By Truckers "3 Dimes Down"Steve Earle "Satellite Radio"*Sarah Evans "Suds In The Bucket"*Alan Jackson "Good Time"Miranda Lambert "Gunpowder Lead"*Martina McBride "This One's For the Girls"*Montgomery Gentry "Gone"*Willie Nelson "On The Road Again"Brad Paisley "Mud On The Tires"*Rascal Flatts "Me and My Gang"*Kenny Rogers "The Gambler"*Keith Urban "I Told You So"*Shania Twain "Any Man of Mine"Lucinda Williams "Can't Let Go"* = limited-time exclusive track
